replies.body:
{{champion:40}} Ooooooooo

{{champion:59}} What the…

{{champion:40}} Oooooo Jarvan IV, I am the ghost of Christmas past. 

{{champion:59}} Janna what are you doing?

{{champion:40}} I am not Janna; I am the ghost of Christmas past.

{{champion:59}} Why are you here then?

{{champion:40}} I am here to show you the past. Behold all your past failed dates.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/zLAEmrBJ-jarvan-iv-blind-date-stories

{{champion:59}}  Ok then let me ask again: Why are you in my bedroom in the middle of the night Janna?

{{champion:40}} Well…Why didn’t you ask me out on a date?

{{champion:59}} *sigh* Do you want to go on a date Janna?

{{champion:40}} Yes please. 

{{champion:59}} Ok, but on Monday. Now let me go back to sleep. 

{{champion:40}} Ok Jarvan IV.

*walks out of the room*

{{champion:40}} Oh..hi Shyvana.

{{champion:102}} Do you know how long it takes for a dragon, even a half-dragon to fall asleep? 

{{champion:40}} Umm..*runs*

{{champion:102}} YEAH YOU BETTER RUN!!!!



{{summoner:31}} Merry Christmas{{summoner:30}}

Oh, and Popstar Ahri can make blue buff dance. 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Jj_lDxTF2U
THAT IS SO AMAZING love {{champion:103}} even more <3

I would think so too.

I don't know if it was on purpose or not, but Popstar Ahri were on sale since past sale started. Its been 487 rp since 23 december. 

By the way, when {{champion:412}} and {{champion:60}} Blood Moon skins will release? 

Merry Christmas Everyone ~

If you look on the Lunar Revel wiki, it shows those two skins on the list. Taking that information and looking at the time Lunar Revel came out last year, we can expect to see them late January or early February. 

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Category:2015_Lunar_Revel

Sucks I know. It sucks that these two skins might never get a sale, but be permanent 975 RP.
Kog Maw is past due...
If only he wasn't on sale last week
Hm. These skins would be cool to have. Especially if I could just put RP into my account.
New blood moon skins come out for the Lunar Revel boys.
whats the lunar revel?
When will that be?
Lunar Revel happens during February. But the blood moon skins should be out way before then.
I hope so. We already have bloodmoon Kalista!
Blood moon thresh all the way!{{champion:412}}
